items.title: Case Study: Issues of Foreign Investors doing Business in US

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: The course focuses on issues that non-US companies or individuals face investing in or conducting business in the US.
objectives_summary: Provide non-tax people the general Inbound framework to allow for better communication between the Operations and Finance/Tax sides of the business.
Allow decision-makers to identify the material, practical impact of the US Inbound rules.
Provide a listing of other topics that personnel should focus on if they desire to make a more profound impact on their companies and personal investments.

items.title: Expatriation: Top Ten International Tax Topics

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course discusses the specific US rules on expatriating.
objectives_summary: Discover how / why the US taxes based on citizenship, not simply residency.
Explore the impact / burden of worldwide taxation.
Discover why and how people are expatriating

items.title: How to decide whether to become a CPA in Australia
items.headline: Process on how to make a decision whether to become a Certified Practising Accountant in Australia
objectives_summary: What factors do you need to consider before deciding to become a CPA?
Why do you really want to become a CPA?
What is the difference between a CPA in Australian and a CPA in the US?

items.title: Computing Corporate Earnings and Profits for Tax Purposes

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course covers the Why, When, and How of computing Earnings & Profits (E&P).
objectives_summary: Explore why it is important to compute Earnings and Profits (E&P).
Discover how distributions from a corporation to its shareholders are taxed.
Recognize the difference between taxable income and current E&P, and explore a case study that compares taxable income and Book Income with E&P.

items.title: Corporate Tax Filing: Schedule M-3: Part I

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course covers the Schedule M-3, Part I filing and reporting requirements.
objectives_summary: Identify which entities are required to file Schedule M-3.
Identify the basic financial information disclosure requirements.
Identify how to reconcile worldwide consolidated net income, line 4 to net income of includible corporations, lines 4-11.

items.title: Income Tax Convergence Project and Technical Agenda

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course discusses the tax accounting standards convergence by the FASB and the ISAB.
objectives_summary: Identify elements of the tax convergence process that have been and will be utilized.
Identify the convergence tax items which still need to be reconciled.
Recognize the income tax convergence due process for completion.
